alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 2:05PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...Period of Snow Expected Late This Afternoon and Evening... Snow is expected to become more widespread between 3 PM and 8 PM. Accumulations around an inch to perhaps two inches on the higher ridges are expected during this time for elevations above 2000 feet with temperatures around 30 to 32 degrees. The ridges along Interstate 68 will be impacted by the snowfall and surfaces may become snow covered and slippery. Use caution when driving. For lower elevations below 2000 feet. Snow may mix with rain and a slushy coating is possible with temperatures slightly above freezing.
